definition: to inspect and verify/experimental verification/to validate (a theory)/to authenticate
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]
verification code/CAPTCHA, a type of challenge-response test (computing)

sentences.english: The verification and measurement plan of checking fixture dimension should be confirmed by YFV engineer.
sentences.chinese: 檢具的尺寸驗證測量計劃需得到延鋒工程師的確認。

sentences.english: Simulations have been made to validate the good separation performance of the algor…
sentences.chinese: 仿真驗證對聲音等非平穩信號具有良好的分離效果。

sentences.english: Major non-conformities should require on-site verification within 80 days.
sentences.chinese: 嚴重不符合項應該要求在80天內完成現場驗證工作。

sentences.english: A dynamic and verifiable threshold color visual multi-secret sharing scheme was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了動態可驗證的彩色可視多重祕密共享方案。

sentences.english: The expression is validated in Synopsys device simulation tools MEDICI.
sentences.chinese: 表達式用MEDICI器件模擬軟件進行了驗證。

sentences.english: Finally, this paper modeled the scheme using OPNET.
sentences.chinese: 最後在OPNET中對相應的方案進行了仿真驗證。

sentences.english: We validated next generation radios for cars at General Motors.
sentences.chinese: 我們驗證了下一代車輛的無線廣播系統。

sentences.english: Right-click on the managed system you want to enter the validation code for.
sentences.chinese: 右鍵單擊您想要爲其輸入驗證代碼的所管理系統。

sentences.english: Reinitializes all subscriptions that have data validation failures.
sentences.chinese: 重新初始化所有存在數據驗證失敗的訂閱。

sentences.english: The results of confirmatory factor analysis indicated good structural validity of SDQ.
sentences.chinese: 驗證性因子分析的指標均達到測量學要求。

sentences.english: If you choose to validate documents, you typically validate at insert time.
sentences.chinese: 如果選擇驗證文檔，那麼通常是在插入時進行驗證。

sentences.english: If you choose to validate documents, you typically validate at insert time.
sentences.chinese: 如果選擇驗證文檔，那麼通常是在插入時進行驗證。

sentences.english: When nonconforming product is corrected it shall be subject to re-verification to demonstrate conformity to the requirements.
sentences.chinese: 應對糾正後的產品再次進行驗證，以證實符合要求。

sentences.english: Go back to the configuration tool and find the Authentication tab.
sentences.chinese: 回到配置工具，並找到驗證標籤。

sentences.english: Enter POL in the media code box and click the Verify button.
sentences.chinese: 輸入油料在媒體上的代碼框，並點擊驗證按鈕。

sentences.english: Two-factor authentication is a popular method being practiced for increased security.
sentences.chinese: 雙因素身份驗證是增強安全性的流行方法。

to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
